T02TD2800E:160b-0: @160b * // thugs rje chen po ri khrod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2800E:160b-1: rab tu yid dga' nags kyi dbus //
T02TD2800E:160b-3: shing drung rtsva yi spyil bu nyid //
T02TD2800E:160b-4: chags bral rnyog pa med bzhugs 'dud //
T02TD2800E:160b-5: de nas sgrub po spros pas 'jigs pa dang //
T02TD2800E:160b-6: rnam par g-yeng bas dal ba thob ba yang rung ste /
T02TD2800E:160b-7: gcig pu dag dben pa dang yid byung ba'i blo can gyis /
T02TD2800E:160b-8: dus bzang po'i tshe nags su song la gang na ljon shing bzang ba la yal ga dang lo 'bras gya nom pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2800E:160b-9: grib ma bsil bas lus skyob cing drung na 'dug na skyid ltar snang ba yod pa zhig btsal te /
T02TD2800E:160b-10: de'i 'gram du gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du btang nas rtsva'i spyil bu mdzes pa bcos par bya'o //
T02TD2800E:160b-11: de'i nang gi steng gi gzhir rje btsun spyan ras gzigs spyil bu can gyi rten byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa zhig bzhugs la /
T02TD2800E:160b-12: mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas /
T02TD2800E:160b-13: me tog gis snyim pa bkang ste /
T02TD2800E:160b-15: aom a'a:hr'i:ba na lo ka n'a tha //
T02TD2800E:160b-16: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka / sarba buddha dzny'a n'a garbha ma ma tsitte kant'a h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2800E:160b-17: de nas spyil bu de dang rten //
T02TD2800E:160b-18: pho brang mchog dang lha nyid du //
T02TD2800E:160b-19: byin gyis brlabs la me tog gtor //
T02TD2800E:160b-20: skad cig de la bsam gtan bya //
T02TD2800E:160b-21: snyom med mi g-yengs brtan pa yis //
T02TD2800E:160b-22: zla ba drug gam gsum mam gcig / nges par byas na nags kyi nang //
T02TD2800E:160b-23: mgon po gang rung gzugs su ston //
T02TD2800E:160b-25: ri mo 'am thig le gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2800E:160b-27: mgo btud zhabs la gtugs te gsol //
T02TD2800E:160b-28: aom a'a:hr'i:p'u ra be pra t'itstsha surmar ho //
T02TD2800E:160b-29: thal sbyar mig mi 'jums pa yis //
T02TD2800E:160b-30: me tog bstabs la sngags 'di brjod //
T02TD2800E:160b-31: de tshe bdag ni ci 'dra yang //
T02TD2800E:161a-2: spyil bu can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
